name: Maurice EVERETT, Petitioner v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Everett v. Pennsylvania Department of Corrections

parties: Maurice EVERETT, Petitioner v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 16th day of April, 2012, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and/or Extraordinary Relief and the Application for an Immediate Hearing are DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
41 A.3d 1282
Maurice EVERETT, Petitioner v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Respondent.
No. 180 EM 2011.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 16, 2012.
